name: Mirror Training Room
description:
Use your real-world knowledge, internet tools and the ability to look at the world differently, to solve challenges at a secret agent training academy.

Submission for the GameDev.js Jam. I am hosting background images for the cards choices on IPFS, and in the last two rounds. players must discover part of a CID to fill in, to get information stored on IPFS that provides the next clue. If any judge needs clues to get to the last 2 rounds, happy to provide. (I've also posted screenshots that show these rounds).

Hand-coded HTML+ JS. All music is backwards. :)
